T02D1790:100b-29: pa rnams stod par byed pa bstod pa'i rgyal po
T02D1790:100b-31: rin chen dpal la gsol pa btab po //
T02D1790:100b-32: de lta bu'i bshad pa ni lung gi tshig la brten nas sbyar bar bya ste /
T02D1790:100b-33: rgya cher 'grel pa'i tshul gyis dgongs pa 'di lta
T02D1790:100b-34: bu'o zhes 'dud bar byed cing bstan par nye bar
T02D1790:100b-35: 'gro'o zhes so // rdo rje lta bur bden pa
T02D1790:100b-36: gnyis dbyer mi phyed pa'i ngo bo gnyis kyis mdzes
T02D1790:100b-37: 'gro'o zhes so // par bya'o // gsal bar bya'o zhes pa ni de de bzhin no //
T02D1790:100b-38: che zhes pa la sogs bas 'di lam nyid bu ston par byed do //

T02D1790:101a-7: 'dis zhes pa ni lam gyis so //
T02D1790:101a-8: theg pa gsum ni lam mngon par brjod par byed do //
T02D1790:101a-9: bdag po nyid ni bdag po drug pa'o //
T02D1790:101a-10: rang gi don la tva la'o //

T02D1790:101a-23: slar yang spang bar byar med do //
T02D1790:101a-27: slar yang mngon du byar med do //
T02D1790:101a-30: slar yang bsgom par byar med do zhes pa ni rnam pa gcig gnyis kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'o //
T02D1790:101a-31: rdo rje gsum ni sku la sogs pa'i rdo rje'o //
T02D1790:101a-32: de dbyer mi phyed pa'i mtshan nyid te /
T02D1790:101a-33: rang bzhin gang yin pa de de bzhin no //
T02D1790:101a-35: ye shes gsum gyi sgo nas zhes pa ni /
T02D1790:101a-36: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rang bzhin rnams ni ye shes gsum gyi rgyu dang /
T02D1790:101a-37: snang ba rnams ni 'bras bu nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1790:101a-38: 'dod chags zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te zhe sdang zhes pa 'dod chags dang bral ba'o //
T02D1790:101a-39: de nyid ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'gro bar byed do zhes pa /
T02D1790:101a-40: rang bzhin dang snang ba la sogs pa'i rim pas
T02D1790:101a-41: don dam pa'i bden pa la dmigs pas zung 'jug
T02D1790:101a-42: lhag par rtogs par byed do zhes pa'i don to
T02D1790:101a-43: // 'dis zhes pas ni 'od gsal bas so //
T02D1790:101a-44: de nyid kyi phyir rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1790:101a-45: de zhes pa ni 'od gsal bar ston par byed
T02D1790:101a-46: pa nyid kyi phyir dang rang bzhin dang snang ba'i
T02D1790:101a-47: rim pas gsungs pas ston par byed pa yin pa'i
T02D1790:101b-0: phyir ro // @101b dbang po'i mchog ni yid kyi dbang po'o //
T02D1790:101b-1: tsam gyi sgras dbang po gzhan ni gzung bar bya
T02D1790:101b-2: ba ma yin pa nyid du dgag pa'i don no
T02D1790:101b-3: // gzung bar bya ba nyid yin pas na zhes pa ni /
T02D1790:101b-4: bla ma'i byin gyi rlabs las dgongs pa tsam gyis
T02D1790:101b-5: zung du 'jug pa nyams su myong ba nyid kyi
T02D1790:101b-6: phyir dang so so rang gi rig par bya ba
T02D1790:101b-8: thams cad kyi zhes pa ni rnam par snang mdzad
T02D1790:101b-9: la sogs pa rnams kyi zung 'jug gi sku ni
T02D1790:101b-10: lha mo'i snyoms par 'jug pa las ma byung ba'i
T02D1790:101b-11: phyir rdo rje'i sgras rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sprul
T02D1790:101b-13: mchog tu dga' ba ni de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis so ;
T02D1790:101b-14: / dbang phyug brgyad ces pa ni /
T02D1790:101b-15: sku'i dbang phyug gsung gi dbang phyug dang //
T02D1790:101b-16: de bzhin nyid du'ang thugs kyi dbang phyug dang //
T02D1790:101b-17: rdzu 'phrul kun du 'gro ba'i dbang phyug dang //
T02D1790:101b-18: 'dod pa byed po yon tan brgyad pa rnams //
T02D1790:101b-20: de nyid shes pa ye shes kyi sku'o //
T02D1790:101b-21: sha zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D1790:101b-22: sha ra dva ti'i bu sha'i mig gis dpag tshad brgya mthong ba yod do //
T02D1790:101b-23: ji srid du stong gsum gyi stong chen po mthong ba yod do //
T02D1790:101b-24: lha'i mig gis rgyal po chen po bzhi'i rigs kyi
T02D1790:101b-25: lha rnams gyi lha'i mig nas ji srid du 'og
T02D1790:101b-26: min gang yin pa de rab tu shes pa yod
T02D1790:101b-27: kyi / byang chub sems dpa'i lha'i mig ni lha rnams gang gis kyang mi shes so //
T02D1790:101b-28: lha'i mig des shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
T02D1790:101b-29: gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can
T02D1790:101b-30: rnams kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba yang dag
T02D1790:101b-31: pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so
T02D1790:101b-32: // ji srid du phyogs bcu rnams su'o //
T02D1790:101b-33: shes rab kyi mig gis 'dus byas sam 'dus ma byas sam /
T02D1790:101b-34: dge ba'am mi dge ba'i chos ci 'ang mi shes te /
T02D1790:101b-35: de lta bu la sogs pa'i dbye ba du mas
T02D1790:101b-36: yang dag par bsdus pa'i chos rnams la mthong ba'am
T02D1790:101b-37: thos pa rnam par ma shes so zhes ba 'di
T02D1790:101b-38: ni shes rab kyi mig go ;
T02D1790:101b-39: / byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su dag pa'i chos kyi spyan gang yin pa ni /
T02D1790:101b-40: gang zag 'di ni dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'o //
T02D1790:101b-41: 'di ni chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'o //
T02D1790:101b-42: 'di'i dbang po lnga rnams skyed par 'gyur te /
T02D1790:101b-43: dbang po 'di rnams kyi bar chad med pa'i ting
T02D1790:101b-44: nge 'dzin rab tu 'chad par byed pa chos kyi
T02D1790:102a-1: la sogs pa rab tu shes te /
T02D1790:102a-2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spyan gang gis ma mthong ba'am ma thos ba'am /
T02D1790:102a-3: mi dran pa'am ming shes ba cung zad kyang med do //
T02D1790:102a-4: rnam pa kun gyis yongs su dag pa 'di ni
T02D1790:102a-5: sangs rgyas kyi mig ste yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
T02D1790:102a-6: sangs rgyas ni 'dir rdo rje 'chang chen po yang
T02D1790:102a-7: ngo // yongs su shes pa rgyas pa'i phyir rgyas pa'o //
T02D1790:102a-8: 'dus ma byas ni nam mkha' dang so sor rtog pa'i 'gog pa la sogs pa rnams so //
T02D1790:102a-10: mi 'gyur ba ni 'jigs pa med pa ste /
T02D1790:102a-11: skye ba dang gnas pa dang 'jigs pa dang bral ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1790:102a-12: thams cad kyi zhes pa ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams kyi'o //
T02D1790:102a-13: sems can thams cad ces pa ni don du gnyer
T02D1790:102a-14: ba dang chos la sogs pa don du gnyer ba
T02D1790:102a-15: rnams so // de'i ngo bo nyid kyis ni 'od gsal ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis so //
T02D1790:102a-17: de ltar bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab ste /
T02D1790:102a-18: rdzogs pa'i rim pa la gnas pa rnams kyis de
T02D1790:102a-19: nyid du mchod pa bstan pa'i phyir mchod pa zhes
T02D1790:102a-20: bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1790:102a-21: dus gsum du bzhugs pa zhes pa ni dus gsum
T02D1790:102a-22: du bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin nyid
T02D1790:102a-23: yin pa'i phyir rdo rje 'chang chen po gsungs so
T02D1790:102a-24: // de dang 'brel pa ni khams gsum pa'i zhes
T02D1790:102a-25: pa sems can dang snod kyi 'jig rten ni rang
T02D1790:102a-26: gi sku la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i
T02D1790:102a-27: phyir khams gsum par gsungs so //
T02D1790:102a-28: rang gi sku zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D1790:102a-29: rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i gzugs so //
T02D1790:102a-31: bcom ldan 'das mngon du gyur pa la 'di'i mchod pa bstan pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1790:102a-33: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i phyag rgya'i gzugs dang lang
T02D1790:102a-34: tsho dang skal pa bzang po la sogs pa dang
T02D1790:102a-35: ldan pa thams cad kyi 'dod par bya ba nyid
T02D1790:102a-36: yin pa'i phyir yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba
T02D1790:102a-38: bden pa gnyis ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i ngo bo'o //
T02D1790:102a-39: de'i bdag nyid can ni de ring gi ngo bo'o //
T02D1790:102a-40: thams cad yongs su shes par bya ba'i yul yin pa nyid kyi phyir de spangs pa'o //
T02D1790:102b-0: mig re re'ang bden @102b pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid can yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1790:102b-1: lha nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid can ni me
T02D1790:102b-2: long la sogs pa ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid can
T02D1790:102b-3: gyi de bzhin gshegs pa lnga rnams re re'ang de
T02D1790:102b-4: bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag nyid can rnams kyi ye
T02D1790:102b-5: shes kyi sku la de'i bdag nyid las so zhes
T02D1790:102b-7: khams dang skye mched la sogs pa'i rang gi ngo
T02D1790:102b-8: bo spyan ma la sogs pa rnams me long la
T02D1790:102b-9: sogs pa'i ye shes nyid ro mnyam pa nyid yin
T02D1790:102b-10: pa'i phyir de rnams 'dir so sor ma bgrangs pa
T02D1790:102b-12: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i mtshan nyid can nyid phyag rgya chen po'o //
T02D1790:102b-13: brtag par bya ba ni rtag tu de yid la bya'o //
T02D1790:102b-14: sems can rnams kyi'ang rgyud la bskyed par bya'o //
T02D1790:102b-15: 'di nyid bla na med pa'i mchod pa /
T02D1790:102b-16: dus gsum pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi'o //
T02D1790:102b-17: bsod nams ma lus pa nye bar bsags pa la
T02D1790:102b-18: sogs pa 'khor ba spangs pa dang sdig pa zad
T02D1790:102b-19: pa dag gi rgyu nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1790:102b-20: byol sor zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni logs
T02D1790:102b-21: na zhes pa dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i shar la
T02D1790:102b-22: sogs pa'i logs na bzhugs pa nyid kyi phyir ro
T02D1790:102b-23: // gzhan zhes pa rnam par snang mdzad la sogs
T02D1790:102b-24: pa dkyil 'khor pa'i lha'i sku ste de'i gnas su
T02D1790:102b-25: // bya bas dang / de la sgrar bya bas dang /
T02D1790:102b-27: rdo rje 'chang chen po dang 'dra bar ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
T02D1790:102b-28: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku gzugs kyi dmigs par bya
T02D1790:102b-29: ba de bzhin nyid du 'dod pa'i dbang las logs
T02D1790:102b-30: na bzhugs pa de dag kyang dmigs par bya'o //
T02D1790:102b-31: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rnam 'phrul yin pa'i phyir zhes pa ni /
T02D1790:102b-32: rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid ni rnam par snang
T02D1790:102b-33: mdzad la sogs pa'i gzugs kyi gnas pa nyid yin
T02D1790:102b-34: pa'i phyir ro zhes mngon par dgongs so //
T02D1790:102b-36: gtsang zhing zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi yan
T02D1790:102b-37: lag tu gsungs pa'i sa sbyong ba'i rim pas yongs
T02D1790:102b-38: su dag pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1790:102b-39: gang yang sa sbyang bar mi nus pa de'i tshe
T02D1790:102b-40: la lag pas reg nas sngags bzlas par bya ste
T02D1790:102b-41: bsgoms pas yongs su dag pa nyid yin pa'i phyir
T02D1790:103a-0: ro // gtsug lag khang la sogs pa legs par 'dus byas pa 'am sa'i phyogs ni @103a * //
T02D1790:103a-2: sa'i cha ni chu rlung dang /
T02D1790:103a-5: rgyal nyid skyes zhes pa ni rgyal ba'i bdag nyid la skyes pa nyid kyi phyir dang /
T02D1790:103a-6: rgyal ba la dmigs pa nyid yin pa'i phyir rgyal nyid skyes te /
T02D1790:103a-7: rdo rje theg pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la brdar btags pa ste /
T02D1790:103a-8: skye bo dam pa gang yin pa la'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1790:103a-9: rab tu dang ba dang mnyam pa'o //
T02D1790:103a-10: ba'i lci ba ni srog chags med pa'i ba'i lci ba'o //
T02D1790:103a-11: dri ni tsandan la sogs pa'i dri'i rdzas kyi shun pa phye mar sbyar ba'o //
T02D1790:103a-12: sogs pa'i sgras gur kum la sogs pa gzung bar bya'o //
T02D1790:103a-13: sa phyogs su ni mthil mnyam par legs par brdung zhing skra la sogs pa bsal bar ro //
T02D1790:103a-14: me tog la sogs pa yongs su gzung ngo ni
T02D1790:103a-15: sa la gcal du bkram pa'i don du yang ngo
T02D1790:103a-16: // sogs pa'i sgras bdug pa dang lha bshos la
T02D1790:103a-17: sogs pa yongs brtag pa zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D1790:103a-18: pa la rang gi lha mnyes par bya ba'i don
T02D1790:103a-19: du ni de la mngon par brjod pa'i sa phyogs
T02D1790:103a-20: su bshad pa la sogs pa rnams kyis khru gcig
T02D1790:103a-21: pa la sogs pa'i tshad kyis gru bzhi pa'i dkyil
T02D1790:103a-22: 'khor byas nas sgo bzhi pa la sogs pa dang
T02D1790:103a-23: ldan pa me tog la sogs rnams kyis kyang mtshan
T02D1790:103a-24: ma la sogs pa brtags te /
T02D1790:103a-25: yid kyis dmigs nas ji lta bar aom a'a:badzradhrika badzra
T02D1790:103a-26: pushpam pra t'itstsha h'um zhes pas dbus su spyan drangs
T02D1790:103a-27: te / 'dus par bsams nas mchod yon dang zhabs bsil la sogs pa byin te /
T02D1790:103a-28: mchod pa'i cho gar gsungs pa'i rim pas mchod par bya'o //
T02D1790:103a-29: de bzhin du dbus su dzi na dzi ka la sogs pas me tog lan gsum dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1790:103a-31: aom a'a:ma h'a badzra dhri ka badzra pushpam pra t'itstsha
T02D1790:103a-32: h'um zhes pas me tog phul cig / de bzhin
T02D1790:103a-33: du gtso bo la shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su
T02D1790:103a-34: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin nyid
T02D1790:103a-35: du dmigs nas aom a'a:dzi na dzi ka badzra pushpam
T02D1790:103a-36: pra t'itstsha h'um de bzhin du ratna dhri ka la
T02D1790:103a-38: aom a'a:badzra dhri ka badzra pushpam pra t'itstsha h'um gis
T02D1790:103a-39: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa bzhi po rnams
T02D1790:103a-40: kyi spyi ba'i bla ma mi bskyod pa mchod par
T02D1790:103a-41: bya'o // aom a'a:moh'a ra ti badzra pushpam pra t'itstsha
T02D1790:103a-42: h'um gis go rims bzhin lha mo bzhi po mchod
T02D1790:103b-0: bya'o // @103b nas ; // aom a'a:r'u pa badzra
T02D1790:103b-1: pushpam pra t'itstsha h'um zhes pas gzugs rdo rje la
T02D1790:103b-2: sogs pa lnga po mchod nas rim pa ji lta
T02D1790:103b-3: bar de dang de'i spyi bo'i rnam par snang mdzad
T02D1790:103b-4: la sogs pa lnga po mchod par bya'o //
T02D1790:103b-5: byams pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' brgyad
T02D1790:103b-6: la yang aom a'a:mee tri ya badzra pushpam pra t'itstsha
T02D1790:103b-7: h'um zhes bya bas go rims bzhin du mchod nas
T02D1790:103b-8: byams pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gnyis
T02D1790:103b-9: kyis spyi bo'i rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa
T02D1790:103b-10: bzhi bo rnams mchod par bya'o //
T02D1790:103b-11: gshin rje gshed la sogs pa bzhi po la aom
T02D1790:103b-12: a'a:ya m'anta krita badzra pushpam t'itstsha h'um gis mchod par
T02D1790:103b-13: bya'o // da rnams kyi spyi bo'i rnam par snang
T02D1790:103b-14: mdzad la sogs pa bzhi po la'ang de bzhin du'o
T02D1790:103b-15: bya'o // // mi g-yo ba la sogs pa dug la /
T02D1790:103b-16: aom a'a:aa tsa la badzra pushpam pra t'itstsha h'um gis mchod par bya'o //
T02D1790:103b-17: mi g-yo ba la sogs pa grva na gnas pa
T02D1790:103b-18: rnams kyi spyi bo'i rnam par snang mdzad la sogs
T02D1790:103b-20: 'og dang steng du bzhugs pa'i khro bo gnyis ni
T02D1790:103b-21: gshin rje mthar byed dang padma mthar byed dag gi
T02D1790:103b-23: skabs gzhan nyid du sgo skyong bar byed pa dang 'khrul mar 'gyur te /
T02D1790:103b-24: rgyab tu zhugs pa nyid kyang khang pa brtsegs pa'i
T02D1790:103b-25: nang du bzhugs pa nyid yin pas mi 'gal ba
T02D1790:103b-26: nyid do // grva ru zur gyi 'gram pa gnyis su dang /
T02D1790:103b-27: sgo'i sgo 'gram gnyis su yang gtso bo'i sngags kyis me tog dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1790:103b-28: dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du zla ba'i snam bu
T02D1790:103b-29: la mchod pa'i lha mo bcu drug mchod par bya
T02D1790:103b-30: ste / aom a'a:badzra pushpam badzra pushpam pra pra t'itstsha
T02D1790:103b-31: p'u dza h'um zhes rang rang gi ming yig dang
T02D1790:103b-32: po la zla ba dang thig ler ldan pa dang
T02D1790:103b-33: spel nas sgo'i logs gnyis su lha mo gnyis la
T02D1790:103b-34: ste / mchod par bya'o ; / dkyil 'khor du
T02D1790:103b-35: gtso bo'i sngags kyis byang chub sems dpa' gnyis kyi
T02D1790:103b-36: gzhogs su byang chub kyi sems gyi ngo bo nyid
T02D1790:103b-37: yin pa'i phyir bum pa gnyis gnyis la mchod par

T02D1790:104a-0: @104a * // klu'i blo yis byas pa de nyid kyi cho gar
T02D1790:104a-1: gsungs pa'i sangs rgyas mnyes par byed pa le'u dang
T02D1790:104a-2: po'i rjes su 'brangs nas phyag 'tshal ba la sogs
T02D1790:104a-3: pa rig par bya'o zhes so //
T02D1790:104a-4: dkyil 'khor gyi yan lag tu gsungs pa dang /
T02D1790:104a-5: sbyin sreg gi yan lag gsungs pa'i rim pas 'gro
T02D1790:104a-6: ba rnams rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i rdo rje 'chang
T02D1790:104a-7: gi ngo bo lhag par mos la /
T02D1790:104a-8: aom da sha dika zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags kyis gtor ma dang dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1790:104a-9: 'di nyid mdo dang bsre bar byed par gang gsungs pa /
T02D1790:104a-10: rang gi 'dod pa'i lha'i mdun du mchod yon phul nas /
T02D1790:104a-11: de nye bar bltas la zhes so //
T02D1790:104a-12: sgrub pa'i thabs su gsungs pa zhes pa ni mdor
T02D1790:104a-13: byas su gsungs pa'i rim par lhag mos kyi dkyil
T02D1790:104a-14: 'khor gyi de ma thag tu bskyed pa'i rim pa
T02D1790:104a-15: sgom par byed pa'i mchod pa'i bye brag gsungs pa'o
T02D1790:104a-16: // rnal 'byor byas la zhes pa la sogs pa
T02D1790:104a-17: ni rnal 'byor dang rjes su rnal 'byor gyi bdag
T02D1790:104a-18: nyid ces gsungs pa'i phyir mi bskyod pa bzhugs pa
T02D1790:104a-19: dang bral ba nyid rnal 'byor pa gnyis pa rdzogs
T02D1790:104a-20: pa ye shes kyi sku kho na shin tu rnal
T02D1790:104a-21: 'byor du gsungs pa'i rigs lnga tshogs pa skyed par
T02D1790:104a-22: // byed pa'o // de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa'i
T02D1790:104a-23: rim pa bzhin du shin tu rnal 'byor zhes bya
T02D1790:104a-24: ba la sogs pas 'di'i shin tu rnal 'byor la
T02D1790:104a-25: mi bskyod pa zhugs pa bsdus so //
T02D1790:104a-26: phyag rgya zhes gsungs pa'i phyir phyag rgya yang rnal
T02D1790:104a-27: 'byor dang rjes su rnal 'byor byas la zhes pa
T02D1790:104a-28: la sogs pa nas dpag tshad ces bya ba'i mthar
T02D1790:104a-29: thug pa'o // nu ma'i bar zhes pa ni nu ma dag gi dbus su'o //
T02D1790:104a-30: bar zhes pa ni mgrin pa'i 'og snying ga'i mthar
T02D1790:104a-31: thug par h'um gi yi ge las skyes pa'i mi
T02D1790:104a-32: bskyod pa'i rang bzhin du blta bar bya'o zhes mngon
T02D1790:104a-33: par dgongs so // ji srid du'i sgra ni rigs
T02D1790:104a-34: shes pa m'a ma k'a'i dang reg bya rdo rje
T02D1790:104a-35: ma dag kyang dgod par bstan no //
T02D1790:104a-36: 'jam pa'i dbyangs dag kyang rigs shes pa'i rjes su 'jug par bya'o //
T02D1790:104a-37: ji srid du sgra'i mthar shes pa ni /
T02D1790:104a-38: klad pa mtha' dag la khyab pa'i rnam par snang mdzad spyan ma dang ldan pa dgod par bya'o //
T02D1790:104a-39: kha'i dkyil 'khor ni mtha' dag go //
T02D1790:104b-0: der yi ge a'a:las byung ba'i 'od dpag tu @104b
T02D1790:104b-1: med pa de'i ngo bo nyid du dgod par shes
T02D1790:104b-2: par bya'o // ji srid du rkang pa gnyis zhes
T02D1790:104b-3: bya ba la sogs pas rkang pa gnyis kyi brla'i
T02D1790:104b-4: rtsa bar h'a yig las skyes pa'i don yod grub
T02D1790:104b-6: lte bar zhes bya ba la sogs pas gnas gsum
T02D1790:104b-7: du sv'a las byung ba'i rin chen dbang po'i rang
T02D1790:104b-8: bzhin no // gal te yang 'dir gnas nges par
T02D1790:104b-9: byas pa de bzhin du yang yan lag thams cad
T02D1790:104b-10: la khyab pa nyid kyis lnga'i bdag nyid can ni
T02D1790:104b-11: bzhin no // / de rnams re re la rig par bya'o //
T02D1790:104b-12: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D1790:104b-13: de'i dbus su zhes pa ye shes rgya mtsho ye
T02D1790:104b-14: shes thams cad kyi chu gter lta bu rlabs rnams
T02D1790:104b-16: byang chub kyi sems ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa gnyis su med pa'i bdag nyid can no //
T02D1790:104b-17: bdag nyid ni rnal 'byor pas bdag nyid kyi rang gi ngo bos te /
T02D1790:104b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1790:104b-19: lha sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag nyid can gyi bdag nyid bsgoms nas mkhas pas te /
T02D1790:104b-20: rigs pas gang slar yang 'di'i zhi ba rdo rje 'dzin pa ste /
T02D1790:104b-21: bsdu ba dag kyang rab tu bya //
T02D1790:104b-22: zhes bya ba la sogs pas sngar gsungs pa'i gnas ni 'dir 'brel lo //
T02D1790:104b-23: spro ba dang bsdu ba la gal te 'dod na
T02D1790:104b-24: zhes gsungs pa'i phyir gal te brtan pas gang yang
T02D1790:104b-25: sems spro ba la sogs pa 'dod pa med pa
T02D1790:104b-26: na de nyid du sems nges par 'ching du gzhug
T02D1790:104b-27: par bya'o zhi ba rdo rje 'dzin zhes pa ni
T02D1790:104b-28: sngar ma bshad pa nyid kyi phyir de bshad pa'i
T02D1790:104b-29: dbang du byas nas gsungs pa /
T02D1790:104b-30: zhi ba zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1790:104b-31: lus rten gyi dbang du byas nas gsungs pa //
T02D1790:104b-32: yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1790:104b-33: ye shes rgya mtsho zhes pa ni /
T02D1790:104b-34: khyad par gyi ngo bo ni khyad par gyi bdag
T02D1790:104b-35: nyid can zhes khyad par du byed par 'dir grangs
T02D1790:104b-37: de'i phyir ye shes zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1790:104b-38: khyad par du byed pa'i ngo bo khyad par du
T02D1790:104b-39: byed pa'i bdag nyid can de'o //
T02D1790:104b-40: de nyid kyi phyir ye shes rgya mtsho zhes bya
T02D1790:104b-41: ba la sogs pa rkang pa gnyis sbrel ba'i don
T02D1790:104b-42: du dus gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs
T02D1790:104b-43: so // rang gi lus zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D1790:104b-44: pa la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas ni mchod
T02D1790:105a-1: par zhes pa ni le'u bdun par gsungs pa bzhin no //
T02D1790:105a-2: bskyed pa'i rim pa la byang ba zhes bya ba
T02D1790:105a-3: 'dis bskyed pa'i rim pa la gnas pas kyang ba
T02D1790:105a-4: spu'i bu ga dang bar nas de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D1790:105a-5: rnams spro bar byed do zhes pa'i mthar thug pa'o
T02D1790:105a-7: rnal 'byor pa gnyis ka'i zhes pa ni /
T02D1790:105a-8: bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa dag gi rnal 'byor pas so //
T02D1790:105a-9: rigs kyi dbye bas ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rigs kyi dbye bas so //
T02D1790:105a-10: dz'a ti ni dz'a ti'i me tog go //
T02D1790:105a-11: rnam pa gsum ni lus la sogs pa rnam pa
T02D1790:105a-12: gsum gyi dbye bas kha dog gsum du byas nas
T02D1790:105a-14: karni ka ra la sogs pa rnam pa re re nyid /
T02D1790:105a-15: dbang chen la sogs pa ni dal ba la sogs pa dang /
T02D1790:105a-16: sa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi po la sbyar bar bya ba ste /
T02D1790:105a-18: ci ltar sbyar bar bya zhe na /
T02D1790:105a-19: dngos med ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1790:105a-20: lha rnams kyi skur sbyor ba'i rgyu ni dngos med
T02D1790:105a-21: go 'phang sbyor ba zhes go rims bzhin du sbyar
T02D1790:105a-22: ro // lha'i rnal 'byor sngon du 'gro bas dkyil
T02D1790:105a-23: 'khor bzhi'i bdag nyid can dngos po med par 'gog
T02D1790:105a-24: pa'i yan lag de nyid go 'phang ste gnas ye
T02D1790:105a-25: shes kyi sku'i skyed pa'i rgyu'o //
T02D1790:105a-26: dbang chen la sogs pa ni gang las 'byung bar 'gyur ba de las sbyar bar bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02D1790:105a-27: de nyid kyi phyir de 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1790:105a-28: phyi dus zhes pa sgra ji lta bar mngon par zhen pa'o //
T02D1790:105a-29: dngos grub ces pa ni bshad ma thag pa'i rdzogs
T02D1790:105a-30: pa'i rim pa'i ngo bo'i dngos grub ma thob par
T02D1790:105a-31: gyur pa'o // ci byas pas she na /
T02D1790:105a-32: skal min zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1790:105a-35: de bzhin du ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1790:105a-36: sangs rgyas thams cad ces pa ni las dang po
T02D1790:105a-37: pas te sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdag nyid can
T02D1790:105a-40: 'gro ba 'di kun sangs rgyas mnga' bdag nyid //
T02D1790:105a-42: sangs rgyas rnams la smad pa'i 'bras bu bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1790:105a-43: smad par gyur pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1790:105a-44: 'das nas gzhan te dmyal ba la sogs pa gzhan
T02D1790:105b-0: de dag tu 'gro bar @105b 'gyur ro zhes bya
T02D1790:105b-1: ba'i don to // de'i phyir sgra ji bzhin par
T02D1790:105b-2: gsungs pa'i don la mkhas pa bskyed pa'i rim pas
T02D1790:105b-3: me tog gi dgongs pa dang ldem por dgongs pa
T02D1790:105b-4: yongs su shes pa la 'bad par bya'o //
T02D1790:105b-5: bdag nyid smad pa ni thams cad kyi tshe rnam
T02D1790:105b-6: pa thams cad du mi bya'o zhes nges par dgongs
T02D1790:105b-8: gsang ba las skyes pas dbang bskur ba ni gsang
T02D1790:105b-9: ba'i dbang gis ngag gi dri ma 'khrud par byed
T02D1790:105b-10: pa'o // de'i don gyi dkyil 'khor ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1790:105b-11: ngos re zhing zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi lte
T02D1790:105b-12: bar btsugs pa'i phur bu nas brtsams nas ngos re
T02D1790:105b-13: re la dpag tshad nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'i thig
T02D1790:105b-14: la dpag tshad brgya pa'i dkyil 'khor du 'gyur ro
T02D1790:105b-15: // nye bar mtshon pas zhes pa ni rgyu la 'bras bus brtags pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1790:105b-16: yid kyis zhes bya ba 'dis yid kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D1790:105b-17: yang gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i ched du bya'o zhes
T02D1790:105b-18: bstan no // shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su zhes pa ni /
T02D1790:105b-19: rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor la ltos nas shar la sogs par ro //
T02D1790:105b-20: dus thams cad du bag yod pas zhes pa ni /
T02D1790:105b-21: lha rnams dgod pa la dran pa ma brjed pa'o //
T02D1790:105b-22: ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bshad pa'i dpes /
T02D1790:105b-23: dpe can dkyil 'khor gzhan ston par byed do //
T02D1790:105b-24: de bzhin du zhes pas dkyil 'khor gzhan nye bar bstan no //
T02D1790:105b-25: cho ga zhes shes pa ni rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor bri ba dang /
T02D1790:105b-26: yid kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom pa la mkhas pa'o //
T02D1790:105b-27: mchod rten zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas yin pa nyid kyis te /
T02D1790:105b-28: rnam par snang mdzad gzugs kyi phung po yin pa
T02D1790:105b-29: bzhin du mchod par bya ba nyid kyi phyir mchod
T02D1790:105b-31: dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid kyi bdag nyid can yin pa'i phyir zhes pa ni /
T02D1790:105b-32: le'u bzhi par gsungs pa'i don de nas bshad bgyi
T02D1790:105b-33: ba zhes pa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi de
T02D1790:105b-34: kho na nyid de'i bdag nyid can yin pa'i phyir
T02D1790:105b-35: ro // padma r'a ga la sogs pa zhes pa'i sogs pa'i sgra las aindra n'i la dang /
T02D1790:105b-37: ma ra ka ta la sogs pa bsdus so //
T02D1790:106a-0: dar dang bal la sogs pa zhes pa ni 'dab ma las @106a * //
T02D1790:106a-1: byung zhing skyes pa ni dar la sogs pa'o //
T02D1790:106a-2: bal ni lug la sogs pa'i spu la sogs pa
T02D1790:106a-3: las byas pa yin pa'i phyir dar dang bal la
T02D1790:106a-4: sogs pa zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D1790:106a-5: mig gi dbang po'i yul bstan nas //
T02D1790:106a-7: padma r'a ga la sogs pa rnams mig gi yul yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1790:106a-8: sogs pa'i sgra las reg pa'i dbang po gzhan rnams
T02D1790:106a-9: gsungs pa rna ba zhes pa la sogs pa ste
T02D1790:106a-10: / thams cad ces pa la sogs pa ni rnyog ma'i dri ma zhes te /
T02D1790:106a-11: rnyog ma ni rtsod pa'i dus su nye bar bsags pa'i sgrib pa ni rnyog ma'i dri ma'o //
T02D1790:106a-12: de 'khrud par byed pa ni sel bar byed pas so //
T02D1790:106a-13: ye shes skye ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir byang chub
T02D1790:106a-14: kyi bdag nyid can gyi ye shes 'du bar byed
T02D1790:106a-15: pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1790:106a-16: dbang bskur ba nyid ni byang chub ste /
T02D1790:106a-17: rgyu la 'bras bu nye bar brtags pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1790:106a-18: mchod pa rnam pa lnga zhes pa ni nye bar sdud par bya'o //
T02D1790:106a-19: nye bar dbul bar bya'o zhes pa ni mchod pa ste /
T02D1790:106a-20: lnga yang de yin la mchod pa yang de yin pas mchod pa rnam pa lnga'o //
T02D1790:106a-21: me tog la sogs pa zhes pa'i sogs pa'i sa las bdug pa dang /
T02D1790:106a-22: mar me dang dri dang byug pa rnams gzung bar bya'o //
T02D1790:106a-23: me tog la sogs pas khyad par du gyur pa
T02D1790:106a-24: bstan par bya ba'i phyir de rnams kyi mchog ces
T02D1790:106a-25: bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa /
T02D1790:106a-26: lang tsho nyams pa ni lang tsho nyams pa yid
T02D1790:106a-27: du mi 'ong ba'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir
T02D1790:106a-28: ro // mchog ces bya ba la sogs pa ni zung 'jug bshad do //
T02D1790:106a-29: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i bdag nyid can yin pa
T02D1790:106a-30: nyid kyi phyir bla ma zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D1790:106a-31: pa gsungs so // 'bras bu tha mal pa ni /
T02D1790:106a-32: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i 'bras bu 'grub pa dang /
T02D1790:106a-33: phra mo'i dngos grub la sogs pa grub pa'o //
T02D1790:106a-34: sangs rgyas nyid ni yongs su dag pa'o //
T02D1790:106a-35: 'di nyid la zhes sprel bar bstan pa'i don du gsungs so //
T02D1790:106a-36: 'bras bu don du gnyer bas ni sbyin pa la
T02D1790:106a-37: 'jug go zhes pas 'bras bu dang por bshad nas
T02D1790:106a-38: de'i rgyu sbyin pa 'grub pa'i phyir zhes bya ba
T02D1790:106a-40: mthar thug pa'i ye shes dang ldan zhing zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1790:106a-41: ngal bas sangs rgyas pa la gnyis su med pa'i
T02D1790:106a-42: ye shes so sor rtog pa'i gdon mi za bar
T02D1790:106b-0: 'gyur ro @106b zhes mngon par dgongs pas mthar thug
T02D1790:106b-1: pa'i ye shes dang ldan zhes mngon par brjod do
T02D1790:106b-2: // thun mong gi cho ga gsungs pa /
T02D1790:106b-3: bsam gtan gyis kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1790:106b-4: bdag po'i zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'bras bu'i dbang las bdag po rnams dmigs pa la'o //
T02D1790:106b-5: rdo rje 'chang chen po dang lha thams cad la
T02D1790:106b-6: dmigs pa la thams cad dbul ba ma yin no
T02D1790:106b-8: de bzhin shes pa'i 'khor lo'i dbus su zhes pa ni tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor te /
T02D1790:106b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid can yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1790:106b-10: gang gi zhes pa ni tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa rnams dang /
T02D1790:106b-11: dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug gi sku la gnas pa rnams so //
T02D1790:106b-12: bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor ni ye shes kyi phung po'o //
T02D1790:106b-13: nyon mongs pa zhes pa ni /
T02D1790:106b-15: de rnam par dag pa'i ni 'od gsal lo //
T02D1790:106b-16: de mngon du byed pa'i thabs nyid yin pa'i phyir /
T02D1790:106b-17: 'di la de kho na nyid kyi mchod pa zhes sbrel lo //
T02D1790:106b-18: khu ba blangs nas zhes pa ni mthe bong dang ming med dag gis so //
T02D1790:106b-19: bla mas byin pa blangs nas so //
T02D1790:106b-20: kha yis zhes pa la sogs pa ni slob ma'i bya ba'o //
T02D1790:106b-21: gzhan 'ga' zhig tu mthe bong ming med dag gis rdo rje nyid btsir nas sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1790:106b-22: de nyid kyis zhes pa 'ga' zhig tu ka ko
T02D1790:106b-23: lar ltung ba gang yin pa de bkra shis kyi
T02D1790:106b-25: bkra shis gang zhig sems can kun gyi snying la gnas //
T02D1790:106b-26: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa
T02D1790:106b-27: drug klu'i blo'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D1790:106b-29: tshigs su bcad pa'i sgras brjod par bya'o //
T02D1790:106b-30: lus bskams pa ni gzugs gcig bu dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1790:106b-31: gang gis zhe na gsungs pa /
T02D1790:106b-32: rgyal ba rnams kyi zhes te /
T02D1790:106b-33: rgyal ba mtha' dag gi gzugs gcig pur bskams pa'o zhes mngon par dgongs so //
T02D1790:106b-34: dbang bskur ba zhes pa ni slob par byed pa'o //
T02D1790:106b-35: spyi bor dri med ni sangs rgyas so //
T02D1790:106b-36: rin po che'i char ni rab tu 'jug pa gang yin pa de rnams ni de bzhin du'o //
T02D1790:106b-37: rnam dag zhes pa la sogs pa'i rkang pa ni 'di dag gi khyad par ro //
T02D1790:107a-0: sngags kyi dngos grub byed pa ni sprul la @107a * //
T02D1790:107a-1: sogs pa'i sngags rnams dag gi rang bzhin yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1790:107a-2: gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba ni de dag dri ma 'khrud par byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1790:107a-3: dag rnam par dag pa ni gang ji ltar brjod pa de bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro //
T02D1790:107a-5: phyi rol drang srong dmod pa'i mdas //
T02D1790:107a-6: chen po rnams kyang bcom zhes thos //
T02D1790:107a-7: gang yang 'dir ni ngag dag pa //
T02D1790:107a-8: dngos grub byed pa'i tshig mi 'gyur //
T02D1790:107a-10: bya ba'i rgyud la sogs pa zhes pa'i sogs pa'i sgra las //
T02D1790:107a-11: rtog pa dang spyod pa la sogs pa'i rgyud rnams bsdus so //
T02D1790:107a-12: rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi sku skyed par byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir //
T02D1790:107a-13: mi 'jigs pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs
T02D1790:107a-14: pa yang thog mar dag pa'i gnas mngon du byed
T02D1790:107a-15: pa'i thabs nyid yin pa'i phyir /
T02D1790:107a-16: mi 'jigs pa la zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1790:107a-17: gsungs pa yang thog mar rnam par dag pa'i gnas
T02D1790:107a-18: mngon du byed pa'i thabs nyid yin pa'i phyir zhes
T02D1790:107a-20: rmad du byung ba zhes pa ni mngon par ma byung ba byung ba ni rmad du byung ba'o //
T02D1790:107a-21: 'gal ba'i tshig gis nges pa dang drang ba dang
T02D1790:107a-22: nges pa'i don dag gi dam tshig lnga ston par
T02D1790:107a-23: byed pa'o // de'i bya ba ni don rdzogs par byed pa'o //
T02D1790:107a-24: nam mkha' bzhi'i bdag nyid can nyid kyis ni stong
T02D1790:107a-25: pa bzhi'i bdag nyid can nyid kyi ye shes kyi
T02D1790:107a-26: sku ni thams cad nam mkha'o //
T02D1790:107a-27: chen po yang de yin la mi 'gyur ba ste
T02D1790:107a-28: mi 'jigs pa yang yin no zhes pas mi 'gyur
T02D1790:107a-29: che ste / skye ba dang gnas pa dang 'jig
T02D1790:107a-30: pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro zhes pa'i don to
T02D1790:107a-31: che ste / // bya ba'i rgyud la sogs pa
T02D1790:107a-32: zhes bya ba'i sogs pa'i sgra las spyod pa dang
T02D1790:107a-33: gnyis ka'i rgyud du gsungs pa'i spyod pa rnams yongs
T02D1790:107a-34: che ste / // su bzung ngo // dus gsum
T02D1790:107a-35: dang yang dag par byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i
T02D1790:107a-36: bdag nyid can nyid yin pa'i phyir /
T02D1790:107a-38: dus gsum pa'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1790:107a-39: bsgom par bya zhes bya ba 'dis bsgom pa gtso
T02D1790:107a-40: bo yin gyi lag pa'i rab tu sbyor ba ni
T02D1790:107a-41: ma yin no // rdo rje gsang ba 'di nyid kyis ni /
T02D1790:107a-42: rab tu gsal ba'i mi bskyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis so //
T02D1790:107b-0: sems can thams cad ces pa @107b bdag ma yin pa nyid do //
T02D1790:107b-1: mi bskyod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rgyal ba'i sras su ni mi bskyod pa'i rgyud du'o //
T02D1790:107b-2: skye ba dang 'gag pas dmigs par gyur pa nyid
T02D1790:107b-3: yin pa'i phyir 'dir rang dbang spang ba'i phyir 'dir
T02D1790:107b-5: gzhan du zhes pa la sogs pas bya ba ma yin par ston par byed do //
T02D1790:107b-6: ma rig pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
T02D1790:107b-7: mi shes pa ni pha rol gyi rdzas 'gugs pa'o //
T02D1790:107b-8: der thar pa rab sgrub pa ste /
T02D1790:107b-9: thar pa rab tu grub par 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rim pas so //
T02D1790:107b-10: sems can gyi rgyud du zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'chad par 'gyur ro //
T02D1790:107b-11: sangs rgyas byang chub ces bya ba la sogs pa yang /
T02D1790:107b-12: sangs rgyas thams cad mi rtag ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1790:107b-14: zhe sdang rdo rje'i ting 'dzin gnas //
T02D1790:107b-15: zhes pa ni nye bar mtshon pa'o //
T02D1790:107b-16: des zhes bya ba ni rin chen kun gyi sbyor ba'i rgyud des so //
T02D1790:107b-17: 'di'i don gsungs pa gang dang gang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1790:107b-18: sku zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don 'chad par
T02D1790:107b-19: byed pa 'di lta ste zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D1790:107b-20: pa gsungs so // ba spu zhes bya ba la sogs pas /
T02D1790:107b-22: gsung gi rab tu sbyor bar sgom par byed pa /
T02D1790:107b-23: rang gi lce zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1790:107b-24: yid kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pas yid kyi rab tu sbyor ba ste /
T02D1790:107b-25: sku dang gsung gi rab tu sbyor ba dag kyang yid kyi bya ba yin pa'i phyir /
T02D1790:107b-26: sku dang gsung dang thugs su rnam par bsgom par bya'o zhes gsungs so //
T02D1790:107b-27: 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'bras bu mtshungs par brjod par rgyas par bshad do //
T02D1790:107b-28: 'gugs pa'i de ma thag tu gang gis byas pa
T02D1790:107b-29: de'i ched du bla na med pa'i bsod nams kyi
T02D1790:107b-30: zhing gi phyir nor sbyin pa la nges par sbyar
T02D1790:107b-32: bcom ldan 'das mar gsungs pa yang bdag gi yo
T02D1790:107b-33: byad byed pa gang yin pa de phrogs na de
T02D1790:107b-34: sbyin pa sbyin par gyur cig / bdag kyang sbyin
T02D1790:107b-35: pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par
T02D1790:107b-37: de nyid kyi phyir nor gyi rgya mtsho zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang legs par gnas so //
T02D1790:107b-38: rdzas kyi bdag po gang yin pa ni gang gi rdzas phrogs pa'o //
T02D1790:108a-1: bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro zhes pa ni gsungs pa
T02D1790:108a-2: yang thog mar sangs rgyas byang chub skyed pa po
T02D1790:108a-4: mi bskyod pa la sogs zhes pa'i sogs pa'i sgra
T02D1790:108a-5: las rin chen dbang po la sogs pa gsum gzung
T02D1790:108a-6: ngo // bzhi po 'di rnams kyi dkyil 'khor du rigs nges pa rnams kyang /
T02D1790:108a-7: rigs re re la 'ang tshad med pa nyid yin
T02D1790:108a-8: pa'i phyir rigs kyi rgya mtsho'i dbus su zhes gsungs
T02D1790:108a-9: te / gti mug ces bya ba la sogs pas
T02D1790:108a-10: lha'i 'khor lo'i zhes pa 'dir rgya mtsho rab tu
T02D1790:108a-11: sbyar ba'i phyir dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa'i rnam par
T02D1790:108a-12: snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rigs can /
T02D1790:108a-13: spyan ma la sogs pa'i lha'i 'khor lo de nyid 'dir gsungs so zhes rtogs par bya'o //
T02D1790:108a-14: gsungs pa 'di'i dgongs pa 'di yin te spyan ma
T02D1790:108a-15: la sogs pa rnams kyi rdzas 'gugs pa de nyid
T02D1790:108a-16: bya'o zhes pa'o // de bzhin du yang ji ltar 'byung bar sbyar bar bya'o//
T02D1790:108a-17: de nyid ces pa ni drug pa nyid do //
T02D1790:108a-18: rang gi rang bzhin bsgyur bas zhes pa ni gzugs
T02D1790:108a-19: dang sgra la sogs pa rnams rdo rje 'chang chen
T02D1790:108a-20: po'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir de'i phyir de dag
T02D1790:108a-21: bsgyur bas rnam shes las de'i rnam pa 'dzin pa
T02D1790:108a-22: nyid kyi phyir rnam shes me long lta bu de'i
T02D1790:108a-23: nang du gzugs brnyan lta bu la de dag mngon
T02D1790:108a-24: par zhen pa'i phyir chags par byed do zhes brjod
T02D1790:108a-25: par bya'o // gzugs la sogs pa'i chags pa'i rgyu la 'bras bu nye bar btags pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1790:108a-26: de bas na zhes pa ni 'dod chags nyams su myong ba nyid kyis so //
T02D1790:108a-27: thar pa 'dod pa rnams la yin gyi gzhan rnams la ma yin no //
T02D1790:108a-28: dam tshig gi 'khor lo zhes pa ni dam tshig 'dod chags te /
T02D1790:108a-29: dam tshig de rdzogs par byed pa ni 'khor lo'o //
T02D1790:108a-30: 'od dpag med gtso bor gyur pas dkyil 'khor la'o //
T02D1790:108a-31: bud med dang skyes pa lta bu rnams ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i gnas yongs su gyur pa'o //
T02D1790:108a-32: skyes pa rnams zhes bshad par bya ba ma yin /
T02D1790:108a-33: bud med kyi gzugs kyis yongs su gyur par 'dod pa nyid ni ma yin no zhe na /
T02D1790:108a-34: bud med rnams kyang khyad par du yongs su gyur
T02D1790:108a-35: par byed kyi dang po nas yongs su gyur par
T02D1790:108a-36: 'dod pa bzhin ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro
T02D1790:108b-0: // de nyid kyi phyir gzhi zhes pa la sogs ba @108b gsungs pa /
T02D1790:108b-1: rnal 'byor dang rjes su rnal 'byor dang shin tu rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor chen po'o //
T02D1790:108b-2: stong pa nyid la zhugs nas langs te /
T02D1790:108b-3: rigs lnga dgod par byas nas byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D1790:108b-4: rdo rje dang padma 'dus bya ba yang byas nas /
T02D1790:108b-5: de ltar sgom pa gang yin zhe na /
T02D1790:108b-6: dbang po gnyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1790:108b-7: lha sum cu po thams cad kyi bdag nyid can
T02D1790:108b-8: bud med la sna tshogs pa'i dga' ba'i bya ba
T02D1790:108b-9: byed cing bud med sna tshogs la rol pas mnyam
T02D1790:108b-10: pa nyid du dmigs pa'i phyir /
T02D1790:108b-11: de'ang skad cig gcig tsam nyid yin pa'i phyir /
T02D1790:108b-12: skad cig gcig nye bar longs spyod par bya'o zhes brjod do //
T02D1790:108b-13: sgrub pa po thams cad ni 'dod chags kyi rigs can rnams kyi'o //
T02D1790:108b-14: sprul pa'i sku la dmigs nas yul nyams su myong
T02D1790:108b-15: ba'i dus su longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skus chos kyi
T02D1790:108b-17: de'i 'og tu yang ldang ba'i phyir chos dang longs
T02D1790:108b-18: spyod rdzogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs
T02D1790:108b-19: so // de nyid kyi phyir bskyed pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1790:108b-20: de nyid ni drug pa nyid do //
T02D1790:108b-21: de nyid du gnas par zhes pa ni /
T02D1790:108b-22: sgyu ma lta bu la gnas pa sgyu ma lta bu rnams zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1790:108b-23: rgyal ba kun gyi zhes pa ni yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
T02D1790:108b-24: de bzhin du rgyal ba thams cad kyi gnas zhes pa ni /
T02D1790:108b-25: 'chad par byed pa rgyal ba rnams //
T02D1790:108b-26: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1790:108b-27: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po nyid yin pa'i phyir
T02D1790:108b-28: ro zhes pa ni lang kar gshegs par de bzhin
T02D1790:108b-29: gshegs pa'i snying po bcom ldan 'das kyi sngags te
T02D1790:108b-30: / de yang rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba rnam
T02D1790:108b-31: par dag pa gdod nas dag pa nyid rjes su
T02D1790:108b-32: / sngags so // mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis 'chang ba /
T02D1790:108b-33: thams cad kyi lus kyi nang du son pa /
T02D1790:108b-34: rin po che rin thang chen po /
T02D1790:108b-35: gos dri ma can gyis yongs su dkris pa ltar
T02D1790:108b-36: phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyi gos kyis
T02D1790:108b-38: 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gis zil gyis non pa /
T02D1790:108b-39: yongs su rtog pa'i dri mas dri ma can du gyur pa /
T02D1790:108b-43: bcom ldan 'das de ci ltar mu stegs byed pa bdag tu smra ba dang /
T02D1790:109a-2: bcom ldan 'das mu stegs byed rnams kyang /
T02D1790:109a-5: khyab bdag mi 'jigs pa'o zhes bdag tu smra ba ston par bgyid do //
T02D1790:109a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02D1790:109a-7: blo gros chen po nga'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying
T02D1790:109a-8: po bstan pa ni mu stegs byed kyi bdag tu
T02D1790:109a-9: smra ba dang mtshungs pa ma yin te /
T02D1790:109a-10: 'on kyang stongs pa nyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /
T02D1790:109a-14: smon pa med pa la sogs pa'i tshig gi don
T02D1790:109a-15: rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po nye bar
T02D1790:109a-16: bstan par byas nas byis pa rnams bdag med pas
T02D1790:109a-17: 'jigs pa'i gnas yongs su spang ba'i don du de
T02D1790:109a-18: bzhin gshegs pa rnams ston par byed do zhes pas
T02D1790:109a-19: sems can rgyal ba'i gnas de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying
T02D1790:109a-20: po nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes so //
T02D1790:109a-21: thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pas thams cad
T02D1790:109a-22: kyi sgra ni nye bar ldan pa ma yin pa'i
T02D1790:109a-23: las rnams la 'jug pa nyid du bshad do //
T02D1790:109a-24: thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1790:109a-25: chos thams cad ni brtan pa dang g-yo ba'o //
T02D1790:109a-26: tshig brdzun du smra bas gdul ba rnams 'gugs pa'i don du'o //
T02D1790:109a-27: bsgom mo zhes bya ba ni sgyu ma'i don du
T02D1790:109a-28: gsungs pa rnams kun nas kun du rtogs par byed
T02D1790:109a-29: pa'i phyir ro // de bzhin du yang gsungs pa
T02D1790:109a-30: zhes pa ni bden pa gnyis la 'jug par ro
T02D1790:109a-31: pa'i phyir ro // // gnyis su med pa'i ye
T02D1790:109a-32: shes ni sgyu ma lta bu ste slob dpon rdo
T02D1790:109a-33: rje 'dzin pa dang ston pa po yang ngo //
T02D1790:109a-34: brdzun du smra ba ni sgyu ma lta bu nyid du bshad pa'o //
T02D1790:109a-35: de nyid ces pa ni drug pa'o //
T02D1790:109a-36: de rdo rje gsum gyi dngos po nyid tha dad
T02D1790:109a-37: ma yin pa yang so so so sor bya ba
T02D1790:109a-38: dang tha snyad btags pa zhes pa ni dbye ba'o
T02D1790:109a-39: // mi byed pas na zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1790:109a-40: gang yin pa zhes pa drug pa'o //
T02D1790:109a-41: rgyal ba ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa dus gsum du bzhugs pa rnams so //
T02D1790:109a-42: mi phyed pa nyid las bden pa gnyis tha dad pa'i phyir rdo rje'o //
T02D1790:109a-43: de la sogs pa'i tshig gis zhes pa ni /
T02D1790:109a-45: phra mos kun du 'byed pa dang /
T02D1790:109b-0: sems can thams cad ces pa la sogs pa gsungs pa'i @109b phyir ro //
T02D1790:109b-1: sems can bsdus pa'i don las gzhan du tshig rtsub
T02D1790:109b-2: po la sogs pa rnal 'byor pas brjod par mi
T02D1790:109b-3: bya'o // de bzhin du bgrod pa'i dus su yang ji ltar 'byung ba'o //
T02D1790:109b-4: rdo rje 'chang chen po mnyes par bya zhes pa ni /
T02D1790:109b-5: ngag rtsub mo la sogs pas sems can sdud pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1790:109b-6: de la 'dir dam tshig lnga'i bshad pa las de
T02D1790:109b-7: bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i gzugs yongs su gyur par gsungs
T02D1790:109b-8: pas drug pa yin gyi lnga po rnams ni rdo
T02D1790:109b-9: rje 'chang chen po'i gzugs kyi ni ma yin no
T02D1790:109b-11: ma 'ongs pa'i gdul bya'i 'gyod pa bsal ba'i don du /
T02D1790:109b-12: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po la zhu ba /
T02D1790:109b-13: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1790:109b-14: dgongs pa'i chos gcig pu ni mngon par dgongs pa
T02D1790:109b-15: tsam gyi chos gcig po ni 'dir ston par byed
T02D1790:109b-17: dgongs pa'i chos gcig po mngon par brjod pa ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
T02D1790:109b-18: phyag na rdo rje ni byang chub sems dpa'o //
T02D1790:109b-19: de bzhin du gcig ces bya ba la sogs pa zhu ba'o //
T02D1790:109b-20: mi bskyod pa'i dam tshig gcig pa la brtsams te
T02D1790:109b-21: zhus pa ma yin nam de ci ltar rnam par
T02D1790:109b-22: snang mdzad la sogs pa'i dam tshig gi lan gsung
T02D1790:109b-24: de nyid sna tshogs don ldan zhes gsungs te /
T02D1790:109b-25: ngo bo nyid sna tshogs pa'i don to //
T02D1790:109b-26: bshad du gsol zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni
T02D1790:109b-27: de kho na nyid kyi don ni de nyid do
T02D1790:109b-28: // dgongs pa'i don ni 'gal ba'i tshig gi don no //
T02D1790:109b-29: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig gi lan gsungs te /
T02D1790:109b-30: slar zhes pa ni dgongs pa lung ston du sngar gsungs pa'i lan gyi tshig la ltos nas so //
T02D1790:109b-31: mi bskyod ces bya ba la sogs pa dgongs pa'i don du 'chad pa ni /
T02D1790:109b-32: sprul pa ni sprul pa'i lus so //
T02D1790:109b-34: de bzhin nyid dang lhan cig gcig tu gyur pas mi phyed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1790:109b-35: ma rig pa ni rtag tu rtogs pa med pa'o //
T02D1790:109b-36: de'i zhes pa sprul pa ste 'gro ba'i rgyud kyi nang du gtogs pa'i sprul pa'i'o //
T02D1790:109b-37: de nyid lag pa ste phyag yin te /
T02D1790:109b-38: de bzhin gshegs pa'i brdas so //
T02D1790:109b-39: lag pa de la ye shes rang bzhin ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
T02D1790:109b-40: phung sogs zhes pa ni sprul pa'i lus su skyes pa'o //
T02D1790:109b-41: dus gsum zhes pa ni dus gsum pa ste /
T02D1790:110a-1: pa yang phung po la sogs pa yongs su rdzogs pas 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1790:110a-2: rdo rje gsum ni sku la sogs pa'i rdo rje las skyes pa'o //
T02D1790:110a-4: rnam par 'jig pa'o zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro //
T02D1790:110a-5: 'od gsal ba'i bdag nyid can gyi chos kyi sku'i rdo rje des so //
T02D1790:110a-6: 'di ni zhes pa tha mal pa'i phung po la sogs pa bshig pa'o //
T02D1790:110a-8: rang bzhin gyi phung po dag kyang phyir phyogs par bshig pa'i mthar thug pa ste /
T02D1790:110a-9: zhe sdang ste mi bskyod pa'o //
T02D1790:110a-10: de'i rigs yid du 'ong ba ni 'od zer lngas brgyan pa'o //
T02D1790:110a-11: mi bskyod ye shes rdo rje ni rnam par shes pa'i phung po lnga po'o //
T02D1790:110a-12: de tsam nyid kyi phyir gzugs la sogs pa'i phung
T02D1790:110a-13: po rnams de las skyes pa ni rdo rje chos
T02D1790:110a-14: kyi sku de las skyes pa'i zung 'jug gi ngo
T02D1790:110a-15: bo'o // gsungs pa'i don nyid thob par 'gyur //
T02D1790:110a-16: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1790:110a-17: mi bskyod pa'i dam tshig bshad nas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i dam tshig bshad pa'i phyir /
T02D1790:110a-18: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1790:110a-19: phyag na rdo rje ni bod par byed pa'o //
T02D1790:110a-20: ye shes thar pa rab bsgrub pa ni ye shes ni dzny'a na ste /
T02D1790:110a-23: des na 'di don shes pa'i dngos po med cing
T02D1790:110a-24: mi shes pa med pa rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal
T02D1790:110a-25: lo // 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa
T02D1790:110a-26: dag las grol ba'i phyir yongs su dag pa'i ye
T02D1790:110a-27: shes kyi sku ni thar pa'o //
T02D1790:110a-28: de mchog tu gyur pas sgrub par byed pa ste /
T02D1790:110a-29: sgrub par byed pa gzhan ni thun mong ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1790:110a-30: rdo rje 'chang chen po ni khyad par du rang
T02D1790:110a-31: bzhin ta chos rnams thams cad kyi rang bzhin no
T02D1790:110a-32: // des dag pa ni sdig pa dang bsod nams
T02D1790:110a-33: dag gis kun du 'dres pa med pa'i phyir ma
T02D1790:110a-34: // gos pa'o // byang chub ni rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid do //
T02D1790:110a-35: de'i don du spyod pa ni mchog tu gyur pas ston par byed pa'o //
T02D1790:110a-36: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
T02D1790:110a-37: dam tshig gi de kho na nyid gang yin pas de bsgrub par bya ba de ni sgrub pa'o //
T02D1790:110a-38: chos zhes bya ba la sogs pa dam tshig gi de kho na nyid 'chad par byed do //
T02D1790:110a-39: rin chen chos ni chos kyi sku'o //
T02D1790:110a-40: rdo rje rab tu 'jug pas ni sprul pa'i sku'o //
T02D1790:110b-0: rdo rje sems dpa' ni ye shes kyi @110b sku'o ;
T02D1790:110b-1: / rnam par smin pa las byung ba ni rnam par smin pa'i phyir dang /
T02D1790:110b-2: las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa ni rnam par smin pa las byung ba'o //
T02D1790:110b-3: sprul pa'i sku'i gnas skabs kyi phung po la sogs pa de rnams 'phrogs pa ni gsal ba'o //
T02D1790:110b-4: des zhes pa ni chos kyi skus so //
T02D1790:110b-5: rnam kun du zhes pa ni ma lus par ro //
T02D1790:110b-6: de lta bur gyur pa gang yin zhe na /
T02D1790:110b-7: thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1790:110b-8: sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgrub pa ni ye shes kyi sku rab tu sgrub par byed pa'o //
T02D1790:110b-9: yid bzhin nor bu lta bur ni /
T02D1790:110b-10: bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par nus pa nyid yin pa'i phyir de dang mnyam pa'o //
T02D1790:110b-11: nor gyi rgya mtsho yongs su gang ni yo byad la dbang thob pa'o //
T02D1790:110b-12: thams cad nyid kyis ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi rigs can rnams kyis so //
T02D1790:110b-14: gti mug ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1790:110b-15: 'dod chags kyi dam tshig gi dbang du byas nas sgyu ma zhes byas pas gsungs pa /
T02D1790:110b-16: der ni zhes pa sgyu ma'i sku la'o //
T02D1790:110b-17: phung po la sogs gang bar bya ba ni shin
T02D1790:110b-18: tu rnal 'byor gyi rim par sprul pa'i sku 'dzin
T02D1790:110b-19: par byed pa de'i ngo bo nyid du bya'o //
T02D1790:110b-21: bzhi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1790:110b-22: byang chub kyi ni tshul mchog ni rin po che'i gang zag go //
T02D1790:110b-24: kun rdzob ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te
T02D1790:110b-25: dbang po las dam pa'i bde ba'i spyod pa las
T02D1790:110b-26: zung 'jug ces pa la sogs par sbyar ro //
T02D1790:110b-27: de'i spyod pa ni bden pa gnyis sbyor ba ste /
T02D1790:110b-28: de la mnyam gzhag sbyor ba yi ni de dag
T02D1790:110b-29: so sor rtogs pa'i don du mnyam par gzhag pa'i
T02D1790:110b-31: 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gnyis su
T02D1790:110b-32: med par nyams su myong ba'i di ni sangs rgyas
T02D1790:110b-33: thams cad kyi ste thams cad rtogs par nams kyi'o
T02D1790:110b-34: // 'dod chags chen po'i tshul mchog ni /
T02D1790:110b-35: don chen po skyed par byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1790:110b-36: de nas zhes bya ba sogs pa la 'gro ba'i rnam pa nyid yin pa'i phyir sna tshogs so //

T02D1790:124a-7: de bzhin du zhes bya ba la sogs pa la
T02D1790:124a-8: rgyal po la sogs pa zhes pa ni 'dir de
T02D1790:124a-9: rnams 'gugs par 'gyur ro zhes rgyud du gsungs pa'i
T02D1790:124a-11: bshad pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sha
T02D1790:124a-12: rnams bsgoms nas zhes pa ni ci ltar bsgom par
T02D1790:124a-13: bya ba'i sha'o zhes bsam par bya'o //
T02D1790:124a-14: yang na phyag bya ba la sogs pas zhes pa la sogs pa yang ngo //
T02D1790:124a-15: rdo rje 'chang chen po zhes pa ni rnal 'byor
T02D1790:124a-16: bzhi las rdzogs pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas
T02D1790:124a-18: de ltar bdag nyid byin brlabs pas //
T02D1790:124a-19: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa //
T02D1790:124a-21: ye shes sems dpa' ni sku mdog dmar po phyag
T02D1790:124a-22: gnyis kyis rang snang la 'khyud pa kha sbyor gyi
T02D1790:124a-23: sbyor bas lus thams cad dgyes par byed pa'o //
T02D1790:124a-24: ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' ni nag po rtag tu
T02D1790:124a-25: 'char ba mar me chen po lta bu mi shes
T02D1790:124a-26: pa'i mun pa 'joms par byed pa po'o //
T02D1790:124a-27: dbu rgyan zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1790:124a-28: rdo rje 'chang chen po ni dkar po phyag gnyis pa ste /
T02D1790:124a-30: zla ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1790:124a-31: 'dzag pa zhes pa ni byang chub kyi sems 'dzag pa dang 'dra ba lta bu'o //
T02D1790:124a-32: drug pa mnyes par byed pa'i rim pa mngon par brjod nas /
T02D1790:124a-33: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa lnga po rnams
T02D1790:124a-34: kyi dam tshig ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs
T02D1790:124a-35: te / yi ge a'a:dang yi ge aom gyi zhes pa ni nye bar mtshon pa ste /
T02D1790:124a-36: des sv'a h'a'i yi ge'i dam tshig kyang bya'o //
T02D1790:124a-37: des yi ge sv'a yongs su gyur pa las rin po che'i rnam pa'o //
T02D1790:124a-38: yi ge h'a yongs su gyur pa las ral gri'i rnam pa'o //
T02D1790:124a-39: rang rang gi sa bon gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i lcer bsgoms nas bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02D1790:124a-40: 'dis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni phan yon no //
T02D1790:124a-41: las su rung ba ni lus dang sems las su rung ba nyid thob pa'o //
T02D1790:124b-0: slob bzhin pa'i rim pas rdo rje 'chang chen @124b po dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1790:124b-3: ma zin pa ni lus las gzhan no //
T02D1790:124b-4: gnyis ka ni pi wang dang gling bu la sogs
T02D1790:124b-5: pa la skyes pa de gnyis kas bskyed par bya
T02D1790:124b-6: ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1790:124b-7: 'byung ba chen po las byung ba ni sa la sogs pa'i bu ga las langs pa'o //
T02D1790:124b-8: rdo rje'i rdzu 'phrul mchog ces pa ni rdzu 'phrul
T02D1790:124b-9: ni rten yin pa nyid kyi phyir ji ltar gsungs
T02D1790:124b-10: pa de las rdo rje mchog ste 'od gsal zhes
T02D1790:124b-12: ji ltar zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi sku mtha' yas pa zhes pa ni gsungs pa yang /
T02D1790:124b-13: sna tshogs tshul gyi thabs kyis du ma'i rnam pa ru //
T02D1790:124b-14: rab tu 'jug pas srid pa gsum gyi 'jigs pa sel //
T02D1790:124b-16: sangs rgyas rnams kyis sems can gyi don bya ba yang mtha' yas so //
T02D1790:124b-17: de ltar rdzogs pa'i rim pa la gnas pa'i rnal
T02D1790:124b-18: 'byor pa'i lha'i mig la sogs pa dang ldan pa
T02D1790:124b-19: ni rang dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa
T02D1790:124b-20: gsungs so // grub pa ste ci ltar gnas par 'gyur zhe na /
T02D1790:124b-21: lha'i bzhon pa zhes gsungs te /
T02D1790:124b-22: lha rnams gang gis 'gro bar byed pa de lha'i bzhon pa ste /
T02D1790:124b-23: gzhal yas khang gi shing rta dang glang po che
T02D1790:124b-24: la sogs pa'i bzhon pa ste bzhon par bya ba'o
T02D1790:124b-26: lha dang mi la sogs pa'i bzhon par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1790:124b-27: gzhal yas khang la sogs pa ni de rnams kyis
T02D1790:124b-28: zhon te 'gro zhing dkyil 'khor la zhon te 'gro
T02D1790:124b-29: ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1790:124b-30: shing rta la sogs pa ni gal te yang rta la sogs pa rnams kyis bzhon par bya ba'o //
T02D1790:124b-31: de bzhin du 'jig rten na yang shing rta la
T02D1790:124b-32: sogs pa bzhon pa nyid kyis tha snyad 'dogs so
T02D1790:124b-33: // rnam par rgyu zhing zhes pa ni rdo rje
T02D1790:124b-34: 'chang chen po dang de dag gnas par byed pa'o
T02D1790:124b-35: // // 'bras bu'i phyogs gcig ces pa ni /
T02D1790:124b-36: 'dis 'bras bu rnams kyi ngo bo gang yin pa de ston par byed do //
T02D1790:124b-37: bsnyen par zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni srung
T02D1790:124b-38: ba'i 'khor lo'i de ma thag tu dmigs par bya
T02D1790:124b-39: ba ste / dngos po med pa zhes bya ba
T02D1790:124b-40: la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gang yin pa
T02D1790:124b-41: zhes pas bsnyen par byed par gsal lo //
T02D1790:125a-1: pa yang dag par sbyar zhing zhes pa ni /
T02D1790:125a-2: rlung la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi'i de ma thag tu rdo rje'i sa'i cha dmigs pa'o //
T02D1790:125a-3: sogs pa'i sgras khang pa brtsegs pa dang /
T02D1790:125a-4: de'i dbus su lhag par mos pa'i dkyil 'khor la dmigs pa dang /
T02D1790:125a-5: gzugs phung rtogs pa me long dang //
T02D1790:125a-6: zhes bya ba la sogs pas dkyil 'khor 'di 'od gsal bar 'jug pa zhes pa 'di bsdus so //
T02D1790:125a-7: stong pa nyid la dmigs pa dang /
T02D1790:125a-8: de nas sna tshogs pa'i padma'i steng du /
T02D1790:125a-9: nyi ma zhes pa la sogs pa nye ba'i sgrub
T02D1790:125a-10: pa ste rnal 'byor dang rjes su rnal 'byor dang
T02D1790:125a-11: shin tu rnal 'byor gyi mthar thug pa'o //
T02D1790:125a-12: de nyid kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs
T02D1790:125a-13: pa'i phyir 'dir mi bskyod pa phyung nas bcug pa'i
T02D1790:125a-14: yang dag par rtogs par byed pa ma yin no
T02D1790:125a-15: // rnal 'byor chen po'i dbang du byas nas sgrub
T02D1790:125a-16: pa'i don gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs
T02D1790:125a-17: // te ; rigs kyi dbye bas zhes pa ni
T02D1790:125a-18: 'dir sngar gsungs pa shes par byas la zhes pa
T02D1790:125a-19: // te ; 'di sbrel lo // ston pa yin te zhes pa ni /
T02D1790:125a-20: bcom ldan 'das zhes pa lhag ma'o //
T02D1790:125a-21: byang chub kyi sems zhes pa ni de bzhin nyid do //
T02D1790:125a-22: lhag par mos pa'i dkyil 'khor 'od gsal du bcug
T02D1790:125a-23: pa'i 'og tu gang zhig bya ba de dag bstan
T02D1790:125a-25: aom sh'u n+ya t'a zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1790:125a-26: de nas khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbus su bya ba
T02D1790:125a-27: nyi ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te
T02D1790:125a-28: / gzhag la zhes pa ni dmigs nas so //
T02D1790:125a-29: de'i steng du zhes pa ni padma'i steng du'o //
T02D1790:125a-30: yi ge gsum zhes pa ni yi ge gsum mo //
T02D1790:125a-31: de dag yongs su gyur pa las mtshan ma zhes yid la bya'o //
T02D1790:125a-32: de nas yang steng du slar yang yi ge gsum mo zhes yid la bya'o //
T02D1790:125a-33: nye bar te gam du zhes pa ni yongs su
T02D1790:125a-34: dag pa'i phyag rgya chen po dang nye bar dang
T02D1790:125a-35: po'i mgon po yongs su dag pa tsam la ltos
T02D1790:125a-36: pa nyid kyi phyir phyag rgya chen po'o //
T02D1790:125a-38: phyag rgya chen po'i gzugs la'o //
T02D1790:125a-39: bkod la zhes pa ni tshig gi lhag ma'o //
T02D1790:125a-41: rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1790:125a-42: de rnams ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams so //
T02D1790:125b-0: skye mched ni @125b dgod pa'i gnas sgrub pa po'i gzugs kyi phung po la sogs pa rnams so //
T02D1790:125b-1: de rnams zhes pa rnam par snang mdzad la sogs
T02D1790:125b-2: pa nas gnod mdzes kyi mthar thug pa rnams so
T02D1790:125b-3: // gzugs kyi phung po la sogs pa rnams kyang ci yin zhe na /
T02D1790:125b-4: gsum pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1790:125b-5: 'bras bu dang rgyu yongs su shes pa ni /
T02D1790:125b-6: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa dgod pa'i rgyu'o //
T02D1790:125b-7: 'bras bu ni gzugs kyi phung po la sogs pa
T02D1790:125b-8: bkod pas sangs rgyas nyid la sogs pa sbyin pa
T02D1790:125b-10: sngags zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rigs kyi
T02D1790:125b-11: dbye bas zhes pa ni rnam par snang mdzad la
T02D1790:125b-12: sogs pa'i rigs kyi dbye bas te /
T02D1790:125b-13: rdo rje 'chang chen po yang ye shes sems dpa'
T02D1790:125b-14: dang ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' dag gi rnam par
T02D1790:125b-15: sngar bshad pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1790:125b-16: ji rigs par zhes pa ni /
T02D1790:125b-17: gang du gang gi rnam par yang dag par 'byung ba ni ji ltar rigs pa ste /
T02D1790:125b-18: rnam pa de bzhin du bsgoms pa ni sngags kyi bdag po zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D1790:125b-19: rdo rje 'chang chen po bzhin du thams cad kyi ye shes sems dpa' zhes shes par byed do //
T02D1790:125b-20: ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' ni rang rang gi lha'i
T02D1790:125b-21: kha dog gi rnam pa zhes pa 'dir rigs kyi
T02D1790:125b-22: dbye bas ji lta ba bzhin du rang nyid lta
T02D1790:125b-23: bur yang dag par gyur pa'i ye shes sems dpa'
T02D1790:125b-24: ni 'di dag la bsam par bya'o //
T02D1790:125b-25: de zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1790:125b-26: tshe na zhes mang po'i tshig ni bdag po lnga'i
T02D1790:125b-27: rgyas 'debs pa'i dus tha dad pa nyid kyis mang
T02D1790:125b-29: de'i tshe ye shes rdo rje can zhes pa ye shes rdo rje can no //
T02D1790:125b-30: rang gi lhag pa'i lha'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa
T02D1790:125b-31: zhes pa ni gang gi bdag nyid kyi lha gang
T02D1790:125b-32: yin pa de'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1790:125b-33: rang gi sngags badzra dhri ka la sogs pa zhes
T02D1790:125b-34: pa ni lha sum cu so gnyis po rnams kyi
T02D1790:125b-35: ming sum cu so gnyis so ;
T02D1790:125b-36: / de las phyung ba las phyi rol du byung ba'o //
T02D1790:125b-37: gal te de las byung ba ni rdzogs pa'o zhes
T02D1790:125b-38: 'gyur na de'i tshe rnam gzhag rim pa la sogs
T02D1790:125b-40: badzra dhri ka ces bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags
T02D1790:125b-41: brjod nas lha rnams kyi 'khor lo ma lus pa
T02D1790:126a-1: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnam gzhag rim par gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1790:126a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i zhes bya ba ni mi
T02D1790:126a-3: bskyod pa la sogs pa gtso bor gyur pa dang
T02D1790:126a-5: bdag po rdo rje 'chang chen po ni dkar po'o //
T02D1790:126a-6: de la gal te 'od gsal ba las bdag byin
T02D1790:126a-7: gyis brlabs pa'i rim pas langs nas mi bskyod pa
T02D1790:126a-8: phyung nas bcug pas dkyil 'khor du gtso bor gyur
T02D1790:126a-9: pa ni mi bskyod pa ste /
T02D1790:126a-10: de'i tshe phyag gnyis pa zhal gcig pa'o //
T02D1790:126a-11: de nas rnal 'byor bzhi'i rim pas yin pa de'i tshe zhal gsum pa phyag drug pa'o //
T02D1790:126a-12: bsams nas 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes 'chad par 'gyur ba dang sprel lo //
T02D1790:126a-14: 'dus pa phyi ma zhes 'dir gsungs pa ni /
T02D1790:126a-15: bsnyen pa rnam pa gnyis ka'i bshad pa tshad mar sgrub pa'i don du ste /
T02D1790:126a-16: rnam pa gzhan du na le'u 'dir gsungs pa'i bsnyen
T02D1790:126a-17: pa'i ye shes bdud rtsi nyid ces bya ba la
T02D1790:126a-18: sogs pa'i bshad pa'i nang du 'dus pa phyi ma
T02D1790:126a-19: bri ba dang zlos par 'gyur ro //
T02D1790:126a-20: thar par 'dod pa rnams kyis zhes pa ni mchog
T02D1790:126a-21: gi sgrub pa ni thar pa'i rgyu nyid yin pa'i
T02D1790:126a-22: phyir / rtag tu zhes bya ba 'di'i rnam par 'brel pa ni dus thams cad du'o //
T02D1790:126a-23: bdag nyid thams cad ces pa 'di'i mngon du nye bar bstan pa dang /
T02D1790:126a-24: spyod lam thams cad du zhes sbrel lo //
T02D1790:126a-25: ye shes bdud rtsi zhes pa gnyis su med pa'i bdag nyid can nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1790:126a-26: thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D1790:126a-27: de bzhin gshegs pa 'chad par 'gyur ba rnams kyi
T02D1790:126a-28: sngags kyi de nyid don bsgrub pa'o zhes pa la
T02D1790:126a-29: ltos nas sprel ba ni drug pa'o //
T02D1790:126a-30: mchog ni sangs rgyas nyid kyi mtshan nyid do //
T02D1790:126a-31: bshad pa zhes pa ni rtsa ba la ltos nas gsungs pa'o //
T02D1790:126a-32: mdor bstan pa'i tshig rnams kyi zhes pa ni /
T02D1790:126a-33: 'chad bzhin pa'i 'dus pa phyi ma'i rgyas par bshad pa la ltos nas so //
T02D1790:126a-34: rgyas par bshad pa gsungs pa zhes pa ni 'dus pa phyi ma nyid do //
T02D1790:126a-35: 'phags pa'i bshad pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'chad par 'gyur ba dang sprel lo //
T02D1790:126a-36: so so'i bshad pa gsungs pa zhes pa ni 'chad
T02D1790:126b-0: par 'gyur ba la ltos nas sngar gsungs @126b pa'i
T02D1790:126b-1: bshad pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1790:126b-2: dbang po rnams zhes pa bshad pa ni phal cher rdo rje phreng bar gsungs so //
T02D1790:126b-3: sems kyi zhes pa ni sems nyid mig la sogs
T02D1790:126b-4: pa'i dbang po dang yul la brten nas gzung ba
T02D1790:126b-5: dang 'dzin pa po dang 'dzin pa'i ngo bor gnas
T02D1790:126b-6: so zhes mngon par dgongs so //
T02D1790:126b-7: dman pa zhes pa la sogs pas de'i yul gsungs so //
T02D1790:126b-8: rnam par sbyong bar byed pa zhes pa 'dis yan
T02D1790:126b-9: lag dang po skye bo thams cad kyi thun mong
T02D1790:126b-11: sangs rgyas lnga ni mig la sogs pa ste zhes
T02D1790:126b-12: pa 'dis thun mong gi bsnyen pa dang 'brel ba'i
T02D1790:126b-13: dbang du byas nas gsungs so //
T02D1790:126b-14: gsang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D1790:126b-15: rtog pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa /
T02D1790:126b-16: sngar mdor bstan pa'i rgyas par bshad pa ston par byed do //
T02D1790:126b-17: de nyid la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gnas pa ni /
T02D1790:126b-18: sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su rtog par byed pa'i gnas
T02D1790:126b-19: skabs so de ltar dpyad nas zhes pa ni gzung
T02D1790:126b-20: ba la sogs pa rnams phan tshun la ltos nas
T02D1790:126b-21: skyes pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag nyid
T02D1790:126b-22: can rang bzhin gyis bsgrub pa nyid du so sor
T02D1790:126b-23: rtog pa'o // de kho na nyid la 'jug pa la mngon par phyogs pas zhes pa ni /
T02D1790:126b-24: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba tsam de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid can nyid ni /
T02D1790:126b-26: de la 'jug pa ni tha mal pa'i dngos po
T02D1790:126b-27: dngos po med pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du
T02D1790:126b-28: bstan par bya'o // lus zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D1790:126b-29: pa la shin tu sbyangs pa la sogs pa la
T02D1790:126b-30: bstan par bya'o // zhes pa ni / lus la sogs pa las su rung ba nyid do //
T02D1790:126b-31: gzung ba la sogs pa rnams rten cing 'brel par
T02D1790:126b-32: 'byung ba tsam nyid du lta ba'i 'bras bu sems
T02D1790:126b-33: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1790:126b-34: de nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa ni gzung
T02D1790:126b-35: ba la sogs pa dang bral ba'i sems kyi rang
T02D1790:126b-36: gi ngo bo ston par byed do //
T02D1790:126b-38: snang ba la sogs pa gsum gyi ngo bo de
T02D1790:126b-39: dag rang gi yid la brten nas skyes pa tsam
T02D1790:126b-40: nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba'o //
T02D1790:126b-41: thams cad stong pa nyid ni 'od gsal ba'o //
T02D1790:126b-42: der mthar thug pa ni de'i ngo bo'o //
T02D1790:126b-43: 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni skye bar 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1790:127a-0: brjod pa'i don 'di nyid dbang gi sgo nas lnga zhes bya ba @127a * //
T02D1790:127a-2: 'og gi dbugs ni thur du sel ba'i rlung ngo //
T02D1790:127a-3: sa la sogs pa'i bdag nyid can yang zhes pa ni /
T02D1790:127a-4: sna'i sgo ru mngon par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi'i bdag nyid can 'di yang ngo //
T02D1790:127a-5: phyung nas zhes pa ni phyag rgya thog mar mnyes par byas nas so //
T02D1790:127a-6: byang chub kyi sems thig le'i gzugs kyi ni kun rdzob kyi rnam par phye ba'i gzugs kyis so //
T02D1790:127a-7: steng du 'byung ba'i dbang du byas nas dang por
T02D1790:127a-8: gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams dang mig la sogs
T02D1790:127a-9: pa'i dbang po rnams de dag gi rnam par shes
T02D1790:127a-10: pa rnams kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa la
T02D1790:127a-11: rag las pa nyid yin pa'i phyir /
T02D1790:127a-12: rang gi gzugs la sogs pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1790:127a-13: thim pa zhes pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes pa lhag ma'o //
T02D1790:127a-14: de nyid kyi phyir de bzhin du yul dang dbang
T02D1790:127a-15: po'i rten du gyur pa zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D1790:127a-16: pa gsungs te / gang zhig rten par byed ce na /
T02D1790:127a-17: rnam par shes pa zhes pa lhag ma'o //
T02D1790:127a-18: gang zhig ces pa'i sgra gzugs la ltos pa'am thun mong gi tshig go //
T02D1790:127a-19: 'gog pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1790:127a-20: 'gog pa'i rdo rjer gyur zhes pa ni 'gog pa'i rdo rje ni 'od gsal ba'o //
T02D1790:127a-21: der gyur pa ni de thob pa'o //
T02D1790:127a-23: thog mar mtshan ma lnga ni rgyu ste /
T02D1790:127a-24: so sor sdud cing 'dzin pa ni phan yon no //
T02D1790:127a-25: de yang rnal 'byor pa la 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1790:127a-26: de nyid kyi phyir sa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //

T02D1790:131a-28: bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i dbye bas rnam pa gnyis so //
T02D1790:131a-29: 'dod chags de nyid ni 'od gsal gyi ngo bo'o //
T02D1790:131a-30: ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pa ni

T02D1790:131b-11: ngan 'gro'i rgyu nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1790:131b-12: snang ba gsum yang rang bzhin te /

T02D1790:131b-14: de ce ltar thabs kyi rang bzhin gyi dbang du byas nas brjod par bya zhe na /

T02D1790:132b-3: mngon du gyur pa'i rdo rje theg pa la gnas pa dang por 'jug pa la ni /
T02D1790:132b-4: 'dod pa'i rjes su thun mong ba'i cho ga'o //
T02D1790:132b-5: sgo nga la sogs pa zhes pa'i sogs pa'i sgra las yan lag 'jig pa dang /

T02D1790:132b-14: nyes pa bsgrag par byas nas de rnams kyi lus

T02D1790:132b-34: phyogs bcu zhes pa la sogs pa ni /

T02D1790:133a-1: sangs rgyas la sogs pa zhes bya ba'i la sogs

T02D1790:133a-3: bsdus so // khros pa ni yid do zhes pa ni /

T02D1790:133a-17: ji ltar 'di rmongs par gyur pa las kun tu chags so //
T02D1790:133a-18: sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi 'grub po //

T02D1790:133a-26: rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur ro //

T02D1790:133a-28: sngar gsungs pa 'di khro bo'i lha rnams zhes pa 'dir 'brel lo //
T02D1790:133a-29: de nyid kyi 'khor lo zhes pa ni /
T02D1790:133a-30: lcags la sogs pa las byas pa'i 'khor lo bzhin no //
T02D1790:133a-31: rnam par 'tshe ba'i bdag nyid can yin pa'i phyir
T02D1790:133a-32: dang 'jig par byed pa po yin pa'i phyir ro
T02D1790:133a-33: // rnam par snang mdzad yongs su gyur pa las

T02D1790:133a-37: // phyir ro // rdo rje sems dpa' ni bshad
T02D1790:133a-38: ma thag pa'i mi bskyod pa'i gzugs zhal bzhi pa

T02D1790:133b-0: bud med dang skyes pa'i bye brag gis @133b ni ;

T02D1790:133b-15: de'i 'khor rnams kyi ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i 'khor rnams so ;
T02D1790:133b-16: / sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ni sangs rgyas thams cad

T02D1790:133b-24: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams zhes pa
T02D1790:133b-25: 'dir spyan ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams rjod
T02D1790:133b-26: par byed de / gang gi tshe med pa las lung bstan du med pas so //
T02D1790:133b-27: byams pa la sogs pa yang zhes pa ni /
